text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُم بِحُكْمِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them by His [wise] judgement. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmu akan menyelesaikan perkara antara mereka dengan keputusan-Nya, dan Dia Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Mengetahui.
